abstract: A marketer had faced deceptive advertising charges over positive reviews of games in the Apple iTunes store.
snippet: A marketer had faced deceptive advertising charges over positive reviews of games in the Apple iTunes store.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Discerning Internet users know that glowing online reviews of things like books or restaurants cannot always be trusted. But federal regulators are serving notice that if you stand to gain financially from the review you are writing, you should be upfront about it.

headline.main: Charges Settled Over Fake Reviews on iTunes
headline.print_headline: Firm Settles Over Faking App Reviews On iTunes
